channel.title: Urgent request! -My Second Request In 1-2 Years
channel.description: Hi I need somone to help me... well make a code for me while i finish coding somthing else. i would like somone to make me a key that when you use it on a chest the key gets deleted and you get given a santa hat. basicly just like the full flet i posted like 1 yr ago but using a key with chest. note: you will be given credits when i have posted my server download.

item.title: Urgent request! -My Second Request In 1-2 Years
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

find this in client.java (this uses cheezscape, should work with all):

else if(useItemID == 2363

it should look like this:

else if(useItemID == 2363 && atObjectID == 2783)//rune { initSmithing(2363); flushOutStream(); }
under it, add this:

else if(useItemID == KEY ID && atObjectID == CHEST ID) {//santa deleteItem(KEY ID,getItemSlot(KEY ID), 1); addItem(1050, 1); }that should work

Read full topic
